name: AI Tech Summit 2025
eventDetails: Join the premier AI Tech Summit of 2025 where top minds converge to discuss breakthroughs in artificial intelligence. Explore real-world applications across industries, from healthcare to robotics. Attend hands-on workshops, panel discussions, and networking sessions. Discover how AI is revolutionizing business processes and product innovation. The summit also features startup pitches and investor meetups for tech entrepreneurs.
address: Bangalore International Convention Centre, Bangalore, India

name: Startup Growth Conference
eventDetails: This online conference is for early-stage startup founders and entrepreneurs. Learn about growth hacking strategies, funding, user acquisition, and scaling operations. Top VCs, mentors, and successful founders share real-life lessons and actionable advice. Get guidance on building MVPs, refining your pitch deck, and finding product-market fit. Attendees will receive exclusive access to templates, resources, and post-event mentorship.
address: Online Event - Zoom link will be shared

name: UX/UI Design Bootcamp
eventDetails: Dive into user experience and interface design with this one-day intensive bootcamp. Learn the design thinking process, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Instructors will walk you through Figma and Adobe XD tools. Gain hands-on experience by working on a mini project and get peer reviews. Ideal for beginners and product developers seeking UI/UX fundamentals. Certificate of completion provided.

name: Blockchain Explained
eventDetails: Understand blockchain from basics to real-world uses in this concise online workshop. Learn how decentralization works, what smart contracts are, and why Web3 is the future. We'll break down common myths and introduce you to blockchain development tools. A great event for anyone curious about crypto, DeFi, and NFTs. No prior technical knowledge required. Includes live Q&A with experts.
address: Online Event - Google Meet link via email

name: Mental Health Awareness Camp
eventDetails: An open awareness camp focusing on mental wellness and psychological health. The event includes talks from psychologists, meditation sessions, and personal counseling booths. Learn about stress management, anxiety, depression, and self-care practices. Free for all attendees with registration. Community-focused and family-friendly environment. Refreshments and wellness kits provided.
address: Community Hall, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India

name: React Native Developer Meetup
eventDetails: A gathering of mobile developers and engineers building cross-platform apps using React Native. Network with developers and share your portfolio. Learn from engineers who built production-grade RN apps. Walkthrough of performance optimization and native module integration. Live debugging and Q&A included. Swag kits for attendees. Snacks and networking games at the end.

name: Photography Walk & Workshop
eventDetails: Explore the city through a lens in this guided photography walk. Learn composition, lighting, and candid shooting techniques. Suitable for beginners to intermediate photographers. Mobile and DSLR users welcome. Each participant gets feedback on their best shots at the end. Chance to be featured in LensLords annual magazine. Refreshments included midway through the walk.

name: Eco Living Fair
eventDetails: The Eco Living Fair brings together innovators, eco-entrepreneurs, and green thinkers. Explore sustainable living solutions â€” from zero-waste to solar energy. Workshops on composting, recycling, and upcycling. Organic stalls and live demos throughout the day. Great for families and school students. Eco-friendly merchandise giveaways and eco-games for kids.

name: The Future of Work: HR Conclave
eventDetails: As work environments evolve, this conclave focuses on hybrid work culture, employee wellbeing, and remote team management. Industry HR leaders share insights on recruitment trends and automation. Explore how technology is changing people management. Includes live polling, breakout rooms, and downloadable resources. Ideal for HR professionals, managers, and startup leaders.
